tests.query:
CREATE TABLE t_update_empty_nested
(
    `id` UInt32,
    `nested.arr1` Array(UInt64),
)
ENGINE = MergeTree
ORDER BY id
SETTINGS min_bytes_for_wide_part = 0, index_granularity = 8192, index_granularity_bytes = '10Mi';
tests.name: 02565_update_empty_nested.sql

tests.query: INSERT INTO t_update_empty_nested SELECT 1, range(number % 10) FROM numbers(100000);
tests.name: 02565_update_empty_nested.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE t_update_empty_nested ADD COLUMN `nested.arr2` Array(UInt64);
tests.name: 02565_update_empty_nested.sql
